subject: FORM CHEVROLET TRUCK DEALERS
body:
FORM CHEVROLET TRUCK DEALERSHIP
I am Mrs Mary Barra CEO Of Chevrolet truck and I am writing to inform
you about your Chevrolet truck winning that brought by the United
Embassy which has been on our office for so long due to the pendamic
virus we could not deliver the Chevrolet truck and your funds worth
the sum $8.5 million USD now it has settled down slowly by the
government of USA in the white house Washington DC The 2Chevrolet
truck have Been Mandated to be deliver to your address as soon as
possible.
Thanks & God bless you contact this email  (
marybarraceo483@gmail.com
)
phone : (209) 682-5383
Kind Regards
Mary Barra?

subject: Re:   FORM CHEVROLET TRUCK DEALERS
body:
Hello,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I appreciate the information about my Chevrolet truck winning. However, I have a few questions before proceeding further. Could you please provide more details about the United Embassy and how they are connected to this prize? Additionally, what steps do I need to take in order to have the truck delivered to my address?

Best wishes,
Sylvia
